item.title: Mastodon has a new plan to make money: Hosting and support services for the open social web
item.description: Mastodon launches hosting and support services to generate revenue and expand the open social web.

item.title: Indian fintech Jar turns profitable by enabling millions to save in gold
item.description: Jar has been profitable after tax for the past two quarters.

item.title: OpenAI’s research on AI models deliberately lying is wild
item.description: AI models don't just hallucinate. They also "scheme," meaning deliberately lie or hide their true intentions.

item.title: Raising Series A in 2026: Insights from top early-stage VCs at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Katie Stanton (Moxxie Ventures), Thomas Krane (Insight Partners), and Sangeen Zeb (GV) share how to win Series A funding in 2026 at TechCrunch Disrupt...

item.title: Huawei announces new AI infrastructure as Nvidia gets locked out of China
item.description: Huawei's SuperPoD interconnect technology creates clusters of chips, including AI chips, to increase compute.
